title: Li’l Butler
description: An orphaned boy with sass and pep got dropped off on the Money family’s mansion step. They washed his face of dirt and leaves and now he works there as their Jeeves. He’s the butler who butlers their hearts.
quote: You people have too much money!
altHero: a little butler pouring some tea for a man reading a newspaper
alt1: a family at the front door huddle around a tiny bald baby with white mustache
alt2: Li’l Butler tasting some soup on the stove
alt4: Li’l Butler lifts a cloche revealing a tray of cash, the family laughs
